duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for overseeing the everyday operations and financial functions of the housing community under the supervision of the Community Manager.
Play a vital role in the delinquency and collection of rent to optimize the property's cash flow and financial position.
Manage all phases of the operations, including personnel, leasing, maintenance, financial, administration & risk management, in the absence of the Community Manager.
Supervise all aspects of the property and staff to ensure compliance with the company's policies and procedures, safety and fair housing guidelines, and liability concerns.
Screen, hire, train, coach, and develop onsite staff to ensure effectiveness and compliance with company policies and procedures.
Implement effective leasing techniques, marketing strategies, and systems to obtain closure, follow up procedures, signing/documentation of leases, and accurate reporting systems.
Deal with resident complaints, concerns, and requests to ensure resident satisfaction and implement resident retention programs.
Maintain excellent customer service, monitor service request turnaround, and supervise all business functions related to operations.
Plan for and utilize property resources, equipment, and supplies economically, including obtaining bids/pricing from vendors, suppliers, contractors, and dealing with inadequate service.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Real Estate, Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
